title: Wave Glider gas measurements for BELS
comment: A Liquid Robotics SV3-v300 Wave Glider equipped with sensors to measure PCO2, total dissolved gas, oxygen, water temperature and salinity, to collect data in association with the Bubble Exchange in the Labrador Sea study. Sensors were mounted on the float and the sub.
acknowledgement: The SV3 Wave Glider was prepared by the Coastal Environmental Observation Technology and Research (CEOTR) group (ceotr.ocean.dal.ca). Financial support for the deployment and operation of the glider was provided by the Ocean Tracking Network and the Ocean Frontier Institute.
creator_name: Coastal Environmental Observation Technology and Research (CEOTR)

agencies: Ocean Tracking Network, Ocean Frontier Institute
